column4: which one is the best virtual machine?  virtual machine or vmware????????
hi
vmware is great
what version of vmware? maybe vmware server or any other.... what do u tink i have ubuntu dapper
what do you want to use it for?
I want to open my wind. partition using a virtual machine in ubuntu
i'm not sure if that's actually possible, windows is very fragile when it comes to changing hardware
vmware is also considered a new machine as far as activation/registration/etc.. are concerned
yes in fact i saw a post about some guy how install virtual machine and his wind. partiton just crash!
duplicate your windows partition and try booting that
or at least backup the partition
if i just install vmware u think i will have problems with my win partition?
probably
i will double check it.....  thanks for your time!!!!!!
are you using an atheros card?
no i use the broadcom which comes with my hp notebook
but it show to me all wireless with 100% signal and it is  not true..
could be a bug in network-manager or the driver
maybe .. thanks by the way
if you do: iwlist eth1 scan (assuming eth1 is the interface) does it show the correct signal strength?
i think so.. Quality:0/100  Signal level:-83 dBm  Noise level:-256 dBm
so probalby a network-manager bug
Thanks a lot, i think it's a bug in network manager because if i check wifi_radar it gave me the real signal power
